backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor defining no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten descriptions summarizing all major frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app with a single mount point and module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the full single‑page layout with all sections, navbar, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with company info, quick links, contact details, social icons, and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/modals/LightboxM: Modal for viewing project images with keyboard navigation, focus trapping, and next/previous controls.
frontend/src/components/motion/Reveal.ts: Scroll‑triggered reveal animation wrapper using IntersectionObserver and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Sticky responsive navbar with scroll‑based styling, mobile menu, and smooth section navigation.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Displays an about section with an image, stats, and descriptive text using Reveal animations.
frontend/src/components/sections/CtaSect: Renders a call‑to‑action block with headline, button, and contact details over a styled background.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Implements a hero banner with parallax background, headline, call‑to‑action buttons, and scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Shows a grid of project cards with images and opens a lightbox modal for navigation between projects.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists construction services with icons and descriptions in a responsive animated grid.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Provides a carousel of client testimonials with swipe/arrow navigation and animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Displays reasons to choose the company and animated stat counters triggered on scroll.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates or updates a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCarousel.ts: Manages carousel index state with next/previous controls and touch swipe handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUp.ts: Animates counting from 0 to a target value when in view, respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useFocusTrap.ts: Enables focus trapping within a container when active, cycling focus with Tab keys.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, identity persistence, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInViewOnce.ts: Detects when an element enters the viewport once using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Applies scroll-based parallax transform to an element unless reduced motion is enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for React Query hooks; currently empty due to no backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion and listens for preference changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollPosition.ts: Tracks whether the user has scrolled beyond a threshold using throttled scroll updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, typography, motion settings, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls to a section with navbar offset and sets focus afterward.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, plugins, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, design direction, required images, and existing feature requirements for a premium construction company website. Contains architectural notes, versioning info, and tracked features for build planning.
